attributes.action: Stop the UK Government Repealing the animal welfare code
attributes.background: The Tories want to repeal the animal welfare code,  starting with a move to put the code on chicken-farming into the hands of the poultry industry. This makes animals more likely to live in unnatural and cruel conditions. Join The RSPCA and Compassion in World Farming to oppose this move

rejection.details: We think the following petition is similar to yours: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/125827
